ResourcesPage.seo.title: Resource Center | HeyTCM
ResourcesPage.seo.description: The HeyTCM Resource Center offers a wealth of TCM intelligence-related materials and tools.
ResourcesPage.seo.og.title: Resource Center | HeyTCM
ResourcesPage.seo.og.description: The HeyTCM Resource Center offers a wealth of TCM intelligence-related materials and tools.
ResourcesPage.head.title: HeyTCM - Resource Center
ResourcesPage.banner.title: Health Knowledge Hub
ResourcesPage.intro: Carefully selected whitepapers, guides, and literature to help you explore TCM and health in depth. All resources are free for community members.

ResourcesPage.resources.title: TCM Sleep Regulation Whitepaper
ResourcesPage.resources.description: A deep dive into TCM sleep theory and regulation, exploring the relationship between organs and sleep, and the application of smart technology in sleep monitoring.

ResourcesPage.resources.title: Smart Ring Technology & Patents Overview
ResourcesPage.resources.description: A detailed introduction to the core technology, sensor principles, and data processing of HeyTCM's smart ring, plus a summary of related patents.

ResourcesPage.resources.title: Self-Help Guide for Common Digestive Issues
ResourcesPage.resources.description: TCM-based differentiation and self-care methods for common digestive problems, including acupressure, dietary advice, and more.

ResourcesPage.resources.title: Seasonal Wellness Calendar Template
ResourcesPage.resources.description: A yearly wellness planner based on the 24 solar terms in TCM, helping users manage their diet and lifestyle in harmony with nature.

ResourcesPage.resources.title: Detailed Analysis of Classic TCM Formula: Siwu Decoction Series
ResourcesPage.resources.description: A comprehensive analysis of the composition, effects, applications, and modern research on Siwu Decoction and its variants, including modern pharmacology explanations.

ResourcesPage.resources.title: TCM Constitution Self-Assessment Questionnaire
ResourcesPage.resources.description: A standardized questionnaire for identifying the nine TCM constitution types, providing a basis for personalized wellness.

ResourcesPage.emptyState.title: No resources found
ResourcesPage.emptyState.description: Try selecting a different category or check back later.
ResourcesPage.requestResources.title: Can't find what you need?
ResourcesPage.requestResources.descripti: If you want us to provide resources on a specific topic or have suggestions, let us know. We'll do our best to meet community needs.
